name: Heron
description: A long-legged wading bird with a long neck and a long, sharp beak.

name: Duck
description: A water bird with a flat beak, webbed feet, and a short tail.

name: Eagle
description: A large, powerful bird of prey with a heavy head and beak.

name: Hummingbird
description: A small, brightly colored bird with a long, slender beak.

name: Puffin
description: A small, black and white seabird with a large, colorful beak.
